title: Beyond profit maximizing output, MC exceeds MR

content.prompt: Assume that a monopolistically competitive firm is currently maximizing profit with an output of 100 units and a price of $50. Which of the following is true?

choices.label: Total revenue is maximized when the firm produces 100 units of output.
Marginal revenue equals $50 when the firm produces 100 units of output.
Marginal cost is greater than marginal revenue when the firm produces 150 units of output.
Marginal cost is minimized when the firm produces 100 units of output.
Average total cost is minimized when the firm produces 100 units of output.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
